Black Leaf – Microperc Oil Bong with Showerhead Diffusor

Overview

Small yet powerful oil rig by Black Leaf!
  • Quality borosilicate glass
  • Built-in showerhead diffusor
  • Black and Gold "Microperc" logo on main chamber
  • Flared mouthpiece
  • 10mm male joint
  • 10mm female vapor dome with colored handle
  • Comes complete with 10mm glass concentrate nail
  • Choice of 6 colors

Attention: The nail must be heated on top; otherwise the grinding can break in case the nail expands from the heat!
  • Manufacturer:  Black Leaf
  • color:  clear with colored details
  •  
  • Height:  20 cm / 7.9 inches
  • Glass Thickness:  3.2 mm
  •  
  • Joint Size:  10 mm
  • Product Description

  • Black Leaf – Microperc Oil Bong with Showerhead Diffusor

    Made from the finest quality borosilicate glass this oil rig by Black Leaf is especially designed for smoking concentrates and oils. This miniature oil bong features a built-in showerhead diffuser that breaks up the smoke into finer particles, which cools down the smoke for a silky smooth hit packed with flavor. It only measures 20 cm (7.9 inches) in length, but don’t be fooled by its size, it still has a big impact!

    The main chamber, with black and gold Black Leaf “Microperc” logo, narrows down into a much thinner tube that is equipped with a comfortable flared mouthpiece. The Microperc Oil Bong by Black Leaf, with 10mm male joint, comes as a complete set up with a 10mm borosilicate glass concentrate nail and a custom made 10mm female vapor dome with a colored handle for easy lifting. The nail must be heated on top; otherwise the grinding can break in case the nail expands from the heat.

    The Microperc is available with the mouthpiece, showerhead diffusor, rim of the foot and the handle on the vapor dome colored in six different shades: black, white, light green, amber, pink and blue. Choose the color of your preference when you order.
